<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Translations"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/3/tv/{series_id}/season/{season_number}/translations"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint get the translations for a TV season.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"series_id","description":"a uniques identifier for a tv serie","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer"},"examples":{"example1":{"value":122},"example2":{"value":123},"example3":{"value":110381},"example4":{"value":1433},"example5":{"value":93405},"example6":{"value":1399},"example7":{"value":84007}}},{"name":"season_number","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","example":1}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
